Cloud

Easily create beautiful dashboards with no software to install and no IT required. All you need is a computer with a modern browser and an internet connection.

On-Premise

You have complete control over your company's experience. Keep your data on your servers and manage private cloud deployment with your Azure, AWS, or OCE account.

Embedded

Integrate dashboards into your business applications in any form you need. Host them on your data center, host then on the cloud, or allow customers to host their own instances.
